Hello! Based on this restriction  if i have Q no within supply for May BTO  planning to skip Oct BTO. Will I be able to apply for Dec BTO?

yes  confirm* can apply for dec 2023 BTO. rule of thumb is the new regulations do not apply to any launches before oct 2023* the only scenarios which you won't be able to apply for dec 2023 BTO are (a) you're a second-timer now and you reject a chance to select between now and dec  and this is your second rejection  or (b) you purchase another property e.g. resale
